thread.section_title: Albuquerque Journal | Albuquerque and New Mexico News, Sports, Business and more
thread.title: Prep football picks

author: ABQnews Staff
title: Prep football picks
text:
Yode’s upset pick: Belen was a tempting choice this week, but I go with Hope Christian. This entire season is threatening to get away from the Huskies, who are desperate for a win. I think they’ll get one against the Horsemen, just one of the teams they are chasing in super-competitive District 4-4A. Hope 34, St. Michael’s 27
Sick’s upset pick: It took two months to scratch out my first lead over Yode. Let’s see if it takes longer than a week to blow it. I passed on a few long-shot possibilities (Cibola, Moriarty) and bit on Belen in the Valencia County showdown. The young Eagles have come on lately. Belen 33, Los Lunas 30
